### createAnonymousPointer() {#a5d15b3ca5a91487c95a159ec6c073596}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Symbol &amp; llvm::jitlink::loongarch::createAnonymousPointer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/section">Section</a> &amp; PointerSection, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &#42; InitialTarget=nullptr, uint64&#95;t InitialAddend=0)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Creates a new pointer block in the given section and returns an Anonymous symbol pointing to it.

If InitialTarget is given then an Pointer64 relocation will be added to the block pointing at InitialTarget.

The pointer block will have the following default values: alignment: PointerSize alignment-offset: 0

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/loongarch-h/#l00596">596</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/loongarch-h">loongarch.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>

### StubEntrySize {#af44761ad25d9f144156e678766b76d97}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>size&#95;t llvm::jitlink::loongarch::StubEntrySize = 12</>}
  labels = {["constexpr"]}>
loongarch stub content.

Contains the instruction sequence for an indirect jump via an in-memory pointer: pcalau12i $t8, page20(ptr) ld.&#91;w/d&#93; $t8, pageoff12(ptr) jr $t8
